name: Lööps
description:
Bröther, may I have some lööps?

A point-and-click adventure game by Surprise! Crabs? Completed in less than 48 hours for Shanty Jam university game jam. 

Contact:

Surprise! Crabs? is Austin Vickers, Charles Grady, and Spencer Bowen

Send all questions and comments directly to the development team at:

 surprisecrabsdevelopers@gmail.com

We love to hear feedback via email, or directly through itch.io!
